body: I mean, the guy's an absolute unit. Who could possibly resist? the girl was needy and couldn't wait to be satisfied. Silly husband for bringing a man he doesn't even know into his apartment and for not giving her girl some love.

Man this too fucking good , I'm not of ntr but this is just good for me

As of not being too fond of ntr, I’ve gotta say that the beta husband is an absolute fucking RETARD. I’m not a married man (hell none of us are I bet) but I know that being in a sexless marriage is fucking retarded. Some people would argue and say marriage is about love, but cmon. There’s no way that just “love” is what keeps a marriage good.

This series is so fucking hot and I’m obsessed with it. Dear god, when you read this you just KNOW a woman wrote this. Airi is a blessed queen. Straight men never nail the details that make this such a panty soaker. I wish real guys dirty-talked like that.
@xiphon false info The mc knows that the other guy likes the fmc so he wanted to cuckold him thats why he invited him to join him but he wont be able to do anything because he was tied down
You know that it was Airi's work if the douche is kinda good looking/body. But i dont know if Airi still working in this manga never seen this author selling doujin recently.
i love how she said that sex don’t matter to her and will only love kazuhiko but keeps having sex with ichinose. what a fuckin’ nympho.

I saw some raw sand I think he’s gonna share her with that ryouta guy. Like wtf. What happened to “I’M going to conquer you”, is it now “WE’RE going to conquer you.” Honestly, it puzzles me that he goes through such extremities to steal this chick and then all of a sudden is like “YoU CAn HaVe A TaStE If YoU WaNt As WeLL.” Miss me with that chuck sht. Shorty author and this could have taken a far better turn down the line.

I wonder if the author is also building the NtR guy up until his downfall. The way he’s taking out his own frustrations on her and at the same time making us hate him. Like something will happen late in the story that will destroy his worldview and then he might change to become a better man. That’s the type of ending these authors seem to like for the NTR villains who have a sad backstory, I saw it in a couple of other NTR stories so I wouldn’t be surprised here.

I think I saw a raw version or something of chapter 11. It was on e-hentai. The wife’s a total doormat. Just let’s stuff happen to her. I guess it’s fine for a short story but this is like 270 pages already, and she has no agency. The husband is gonna find out, can’t have such a long story and no resolution, that’s an extremely unsatisfying way to conclude the plot. Especially since he’s given so much story time and development.

Yes! FINALLY! the english version...

i don't know why... but i like this series so much. even tho i know i hate ntr-trash and cheating-shit, but stuff like this that intrigues me... hot milf good plot, is enough for me man.
